brindanagarajan: Hey @sherryshroff I have been exactly where you are about 10 years ago and I know it really sucks to be diagnosed with TB. I was all of 20 and bam got to know my lungs were drowning in their own fluid and I was immediately put on a rigorous 9 month antibiotic course; it sort of completely derailed my plans for the future, but here I am still thriving and happy. Nevertheless, Stay strong and kick mycobacteriums ass. Also please stick to your course of meds and take your time to heal physically, emotionally and mentally and we will be back to seeing you as your chirpy self on our screen in the not so distant future! Lots of love and sending positive vibes❣️🤗🤗
